sqlMap.sql: ID, CUST_CD, INSPECT_ELEMENT1, INSPECT_ELEMENT2, INSPECT_ELEMENT3, INSPECT_ELEMENT4, INSPECT_ELEMENT5, INSPECT_ELEMENT6, INSPECT_ELEMENT7, INSPECT_ELEMENT8, INSPECT_ELEMENT9, INSPECT_ELEMENT10, INSPECT_ELEMENT11, INSPECT_ELEMENT12, INSPECT_ELEMENT13, INSPECT_ELEMENT14, INSPECT_ELEMENT15, INSPECT_ELEMENT16, INSPECT_ELEMENT17, INSPECT_ELEMENT18, INSPECT_ELEMENT19, INSPECT_ELEMENT20, INSPECT_ELEMENT21, INSPECT_ELEMENT31, INSPECT_ELEMENT30, INSPECT_ELEMENT29, INSPECT_ELEMENT28, INSPECT_ELEMENT27, INSPECT_ELEMENT26, INSPECT_ELEMENT25, INSPECT_ELEMENT24, INSPECT_ELEMENT23, INSPECT_ELEMENT22, RESULTS, APP_DATE, TLRCD, BRCODE, STATUS, MONI_CUSTCD, IDEA, REINSPECT, INSPECT_REPORT_NO, INSPECT_ELEMENT32, INSPECT_ELEMENT33, INSPECT_ELEMENT34, INSPECT_ELEMENT35, INSPECT_ELEMENT36, PROTOCOL_NO, PRODUCT_ID, WAREHOUSE_NAME, LOAN_AMT, LOAN_RISK_AMT, OPER_TYPE
sqlMap.select:
select
distinct
from B_PBC_WHSE_INSPECT
order by $orderByClause$

SELECT a.APP_DATE,(select CNAME from B_CRM_BASE_INFO t1 where t1.CUSTCD = a.INSPECT_ELEMENT22)CNAME, a.RESULTS,a.TLRCD,a.STATUS, b.CON_ID,b.PRTCL_BR_NM,b.CON_ID,b.VID_PRD_ID, (select BRNAME from B_SYS_ACCT_BCTL t2 where t2.BRCODE = c.brcode)BRNAME, d.MONI_WAREHOUSE_TYPE FROM B_PBC_WHSE_INSPECT a, B_CRR_GNTY_CON b, B_CNT_MPROT_BASE_INFO c, B_CNT_MPROT_CM_INFO d WHERE 1=1 and a.inspect_Element31 = b.con_id and c.protocol_no = b.PRTCL_NO and b.prtcl_no = d.protocol_no and b.CON_ID = #conid:VARCHAR#

select count(*) from (SELECT a.APP_DATE,(select CNAME from B_CRM_BASE_INFO t1 where t1.CUSTCD = a.INSPECT_ELEMENT22)CNAME, a.RESULTS,a.TLRCD,a.STATUS, b.CON_ID,b.PRTCL_BR_NM,b.CON_ID,b.VID_PRD_ID, (select BRNAME from B_SYS_ACCT_BCTL t2 where t2.BRCODE = c.brcode)BRNAME, d.MONI_WAREHOUSE_TYPE FROM B_PBC_WHSE_INSPECT a, B_CRR_GNTY_CON b, B_CNT_MPROT_BASE_INFO c, B_CNT_MPROT_CM_INFO d WHERE 1=1 and a.inspect_Element31 = b.con_id and c.protocol_no = b.PRTCL_NO and b.prtcl_no = d.protocol_no and b.CON_ID = #conid:VARCHAR#)
